feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: optimize listWithTeamHandler query by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22069
  • fix: Process base64 avatar image by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22165
  • refactor: cookie domain logic in defaultCookies by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22168
  • fix: prevent location input from losing focus after each key stroke by @abhix4 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22167
  • fix: prevent info icon from repositioning when text wraps on small screens by @kartik-212004 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22132
  • feat: add Finnish locale to Day.js locales by @Devanshusharma2005 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22174
  • feat: enhance API v2 exception filters with user context for improved Axiom observability by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22157
  • refactor: destination calendars when rescheduling by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21873
  • chore: add test for updateProfilePhotoGoogle by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22169
  • chore: deprecate platform libraries 0.0.2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22149
  • fix: Optional Question ' Leaves Variable Tag in Event Name by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22175

New Contributors

  • @abhix4 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22167
  • @kartik-212004 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22132

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.10...v5.4.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Unable to set custom class names under datePickerCustomClassNames in the Booker component by @parteekmalik in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21670
  • fix: atoms for local development by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22178
  • docs: releasing atoms by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22160
  • feat: adds timezone indicator on insights informing user that user se… by @weknowyourgame in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21568
  • feat: enable stripe invoices for credit purchases by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22096
  • fix: don't use unpublished org for credit usage by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22154
  • revert: Process Base64 Avatar Image by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22185
  • feat: Use a separate project for Client Sentry by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22183
  • feat: add user context logging to request interceptor by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22180
  • fix: Can cancel an already cancelled booking through the API by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22128
  • fix: the custom icon at out of office empty view by @abhix4 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22208
  • fix: dynamic links considers '' empty string / nothing as valid username by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22117

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.11...v5.4.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Ignore 'dba' for labeling by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22216
  • fix: resolve race condition in ready-for-e2e label checking by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22222
  • fix: use triggering user's email/name in draft-release workflow by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22229
  • fix: Don't default to ROUND_ROBIN as user bookings don't have it set by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22210
  • fix: Avoid prerender duplicate calls for same calLink that could arise with faulty implementation by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21982
  • perf: optimize filterRedundantDateRanges from O(n²) to O(n log n) by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22093
  • chore: stringify user context ids apiv2 axiom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22234
  • fix: add explicit type annotation to CalComAdapter function by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22230
  • chore: add sharp as depdency on apiv1 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22204
  • chore: add user org id to user context apiv2 axiom by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22236
  • fix: atoms local dev by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22240
  • fix: add formatPeriodFull method for different date formatting in insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22202
  • fix(ui): improve delete popup spacing on tablets and small screens by @manthansubhash01 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22042
  • fix: atoms local by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22245
  • feat: add Video Options dropdown with meeting session details by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22147
  • feat: Salesforce - write assignment reason to record by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22223
  • fix: Don't continue retrying SMS reminders infinitely by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22251

New Contributors

  • @manthansubhash01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.12...v5.4.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: optimize google's getAvailability with caching by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22191
  • perf: optimize date range intersection algorithm from O(n²) to O(n log n) by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22076
  • docs: improve English naturalness in API v2 documentation by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22130
  • fix: Duplicate calendar event when a guest is added by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22247
  • refactor: create team service by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22036
  • feat: Waiting room setting for Zoom by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22256
  • refactor: filter out admins and owners from platform event types hosts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22258
  • feat: Add routing-forms record response endpoint with available slots by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22239
  • chore: fix key duplication in common.json by @apsinghdev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21975
  • fix: prevent footer from overlapping content in SearchDialog by @abhix4 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22266
  • fix: Workflow scanning by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22273
  • refactor: replace Prisma.validator

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.4.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add createdAt field to SelectedCalendar and DestinationCalendar by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/22071
  • feat: pbac core ui by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21471

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.4.14...v5.4.15
